title: PLAZA ORB / spirit bomb ready
description: A thought orb to pop up just before the Mercenary Tribunal

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Just up ahead: danger."

links.title: Inland Empire: "You are prepared. Don't put away yo..."
links.text: You are prepared. Don't put away your friend. Your weapon. It is glowing in your hand, ready to serve.

links.title: Composure: "Raindrops slip down the oily fabric..."
links.text: Raindrops slip down the oily fabric of the tail end of your necktie-turned-fuse.

links.title: You: ""Kim, there's danger. Up ahead.""
links.text: "Kim, there's danger. Up ahead."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. I hear commotion..." He cups..."
links.text: "Yes. I hear commotion..." He cups his ear. "Let's go."

links.title: You: "I'm ready to do this."
links.text: I'm ready to do this.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Good. Be ready to take damage."
links.text: Good. Be ready to take damage.

links.title: You: "I'll feel prepared as soon as I swi..."
links.text: I'll feel prepared as soon as I switch out my real police gun.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Do what you need to do. And then ke..."
links.text: Do what you need to do. And then keep moving toward the future.

links.title: You: "I'm scared..."
links.text: I'm scared...

links.title: Inland Empire: "This isn't the time for fear. Go."
links.text: This isn't the time for fear. Go.

links.title: Composure: "Snow gathers on the oily fabric of..."
links.text: Snow gathers on the oily fabric of the tail end of your necktie-turned-fuse.

links.title: Composure: "The oily tail end of your necktie-t..."
links.text: The oily tail end of your necktie-turned-fuse glistens in the cool spring light.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Just up ahead: danger."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You are prepared. Don't put away yo..."
links.text: You are prepared. Don't put away your friend. Your weapon.

links.title: Interfacing: "Raindrops slip from the barrels of..."
links.text: Raindrops slip from the barrels of your Villiers 9mm pistol.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Wait -- your old friend has prepare..."
links.text: Wait -- your old friend has prepared you for this -- at great cost to himself. Make sure you have the spirit bomb in your hand when *shit goes south*.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "For God's sake -- find some bullets..."
links.text: For God's sake -- find some bullets before you go any further. An unloaded gun won't do you any good!

links.title: Interfacing: "Snowflakes speck the barrels of you..."
links.text: Snowflakes speck the barrels of your Villiers 9mm pistol.

links.title: Interfacing: "The barrels of your Villiers 9mm pi..."
links.text: The barrels of your Villiers 9mm pistol shine threateningly in the cold spring light.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Just up ahead: danger."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You are prepared. Don't put away yo..."
links.text: You are prepared. Don't put away your friend. Your weapon.

links.title: Interfacing: "Raindrops slip from the barrels of..."
links.text: Raindrops slip from the barrels of your Nachtwey A80 pistol.

links.title: Authority: "Why don't you take out your trusty..."
links.text: Why don't you take out your trusty Villiers instead?

links.title: Logic: "There really isn't much of a differ..."
links.text: There really isn't much of a difference between these two guns...

links.title: Authority: "What?! You can't compare the sidear..."
links.text: What?! You can't compare the sidearm issued to you personally by the RCM to the pistol of a known criminal?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Wait -- your old friend has prepare..."
links.text: Wait -- your old friend has prepared you for this -- at great cost to himself. Make sure you have the spirit bomb in your hand when *shit goes south*.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "For God's sake -- find some bullets..."
links.text: For God's sake -- find some bullets before you go any further. An unloaded gun won't do you any good!

links.title: Interfacing: "Snowflakes speck the barrels of you..."
links.text: Snowflakes speck the barrels of your Nachtwey A80 pistol.

links.title: Interfacing: "The barrels of your Nachtwey A80 pi..."
links.text: The barrels of your Nachtwey A80 pistol shine threateningly in the cold spring light.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Just up ahead: danger."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "What you have isn't enough. You'll..."
links.text: What you have isn't enough. You'll need more firepower. A ranged weapon.

links.title: Interfacing: "Water streams down your Kvalsund KR..."
links.text: Water streams down your Kvalsund KR+2 Multi-Tool. It looks impressive -- but what can it do against military-grade weaponry?

links.title: You: ""I'm not sure I feel ready for what..."
links.text: "I'm not sure I feel ready for what lies ahead."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then you'd better get ready." He f..."
links.text: "Then you'd better get ready." He frowns, then quickly adds, "Whatever happens, I've got your back."

links.title: You: "I prefer hand-to-hand combat."
links.text: I prefer hand-to-hand combat.

links.title: Inland Empire: "This is not the time to discuss pre..."
links.text: This is not the time to discuss preferences. It's not just your own life that will be at stake.

links.title: You: "I'll fight with my bare hands if I..."
links.text: I'll fight with my bare hands if I have to.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It would be better if you didn't ha..."
links.text: It would be better if you didn't have to. It's not just your own life that will be at stake.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Water streams down your prybar. Or..."
links.text: Water streams down your prybar. Or crowbar. Or prybar. Call it what you will -- it doesn't stand a chance against military-grade weaponry.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Statistically speaking, sabres have..."
links.text: Statistically speaking, sabres have proven to be rather ineffective against  military technology.

links.title: Interfacing: "Snowflakes stick to your Kvalsund K..."
links.text: Snowflakes stick to your Kvalsund KR+2 Multi-Tool. It looks impressive -- but what can it do against military-grade weaponry?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Snowflakes stick to your prybar. Or..."
links.text: Snowflakes stick to your prybar. Or crowbar. Or prybar. Call it what you will -- it doesn't stand a chance against military-grade weaponry.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Statistically speaking, sabres have..."
links.text: Statistically speaking, sabres have proven to be rather ineffective against advanced military technology.

links.title: Interfacing: "Your Kvalsund KR+2 Multi-Tool looks..."
links.text: Your Kvalsund KR+2 Multi-Tool looks impressive, shining in the cold spring light -- but what can it do against military-grade weaponry?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You try to take comfort in the weig..."
links.text: You try to take comfort in the weight of your prybar. Or crowbar. Or prybar. Call it what you will -- it doesn't stand a chance against military-grade weaponry.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Statistically speaking, sabres have..."
links.text: Statistically speaking, sabres have proven to be rather ineffective against advanced military technology.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Now. It is time."

links.title: You: "For what?"
links.text: For what?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Crisis, death. You can feel it in y..."
links.text: Crisis, death. You can feel it in your blue soul.

links.title: You: "What am I supposed to do?"
links.text: What am I supposed to do?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Your old friend has prepared you fo..."
links.text: Your old friend has prepared you for this -- at great cost to himself. Make sure you have the spirit bomb in your hand when *shit goes south*.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear what sounds like an enthus..."
links.text: You hear what sounds like an enthusiastic gurgling coming from the spirit bomb in your pocket.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You know what you should do? Take o..."
links.text: You know what you should do? Take out the spirit bomb...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Shush. He's not drinking the spirit..."
links.text: Shush. He's not drinking the spirit bomb. He's putting it in his hand and he's going to be ready.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Be prepared. Make sure you have you..."
links.text: Be prepared. Make sure you have your pepperbox in your hand.

links.title: Interfacing: "Your fingers reflexively reach for..."
links.text: Your fingers reflexively reach for the Villiers 9mm pistol in your pocket.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "For God's sake -- find some bullets..."
links.text: For God's sake -- find some bullets before you go any further. An unloaded gun won't do you any good!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Be prepared. Wield Ruby's double-ba..."
links.text: Be prepared. Wield Ruby's double-barrelled pistol.

links.title: Authority: "What a shitty gun. But it's better..."
links.text: What a shitty gun. But it's better than nothing.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Arm yourself with anything you can...."
links.text: Arm yourself with anything you can. Unless you have... nothing? Because you didn't find your lost gun? Then just walk to your death.

links.title: Rhetoric: "I can talk you out of it, whatever..."
links.text: I can talk you out of it, whatever it is.

links.title: Suggestion: "You're too likable to die. Don't wo..."
links.text: You're too likable to die. Don't worry.

links.title: You: "Time to party?"
links.text: Time to party?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Time for grim, serious, deadly, dan..."
links.text: Time for grim, serious, deadly, dangerous. It's not going to be fun.

links.title: You: "Time for the tribunal?"
links.text: Time for the tribunal?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes. And it's not going to be fun."
links.text: Yes. And it's not going to be fun.

links.title: You: "Sounds ominous."
links.text: Sounds ominous.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It is."
links.text: It is.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]

links.title: Inland Empire: "No, no. You cannot get off that eas..."
links.text: No, no. You cannot get off that easy. This is serious. Lives are at stake.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yours included."
links.text: Yours included.
